name: Plant Attack (nishma)
description:
This is a simple, retro-style game where the objective is to kill all of the evil plants. The main player (blue) is protecting its land from the plants that are trying to invade. So every time the player successfully hits a plant, it gains or maintains its health. However, if a plant makes its way to the land, the player will lose health. I was inspired by games like Plant vs Zombie, except here the plant is the enemy. The player loses when its health reaches 0, and it wins when it has reached the end alive. I also used cheese as the projectile to go along with aesthetic of the game. As for the sound effects, music, and sprites, I downloaded them from the credited sources below.
